contents.Text: Searches a directory defined in [[[strong:Search Directory]]].

TextCustom.content: Press enter to search or click the [[[strong:Search Button]]] to initiate a search.

contents.Text: The Search Bar supports [[[strong:Boolean expressions]]]. You can mix them as follows:
- Case insensitive: [[[strong:search query]]]
- Exact match case sensitive: [[[strong:"search query"]]]
- Word match: [[[strong:'search query']]]
- And (intersection): [[[strong:"search query1" && search query2]]]
The search bar, by default, performs a comprehensive search that includes the 'full path' of files and folders.
This means that if you search for the letter 'A', it will return results for both songs containing that letter and folders that include it as well.
The reason for this is that if you search an artist's name and have a folder with the artist's name, all songs in it recursively will be returned.
Example: I have a structure like this: {/British/artist_here/song1.mp3}

TextCustom.content: If I search British, it will return all songs with British in the name and all songs inside the British folder.

contents.Text: Exclusive modern search functions:
([[[strong:Parentheses]]]) are used to search columns in the database.
Example: [[[strong:(length:>=1m)]]] - This will search for all songs that are above or equal to 1 minute long.
Example 2: [[[strong:(length:>=1h)]]] - This will search for all songs that are above or equal to 1 hour long.

TextCustom.content: Example 3: [[[strong:(album:Akira Yamaoka)]]] - This will search for all songs that are tagged with the album: "Akira Yamaoka" ignoring case.

contents.Text: Here are all defined column values: [[[strong:name]]], [[[strong:ext]]], [[[strong:length]]], [[[strong:artist]]], [[[strong:album]]], [[[strong:etc...]]].

TextCustom.content: For more information on tags, go to [[[button:Metadata Editor][../Metadata Editor]]].

contents.Text: [[[strong:Tip:]]] You can use [[[strong:AND]]] with parentheses. Example: [[[strong:term && (length:>=1m) && (length:<=3m)]]] - This will get all songs with "Term" where their length is between 1 and 3 minutes.
[[[strong:Tip 2:]]] You can use exact matching in parentheses. Example: [[[strong:(album:"Akira Yamaoka")]]] - This will use exact matching on the album name, so capitals and lowercase matter.
